about_the_game:
game:
This is a score-impact shooting game. Players are limited to a four-sided area. Enemies outside the area are constantly attacking the player. Players gain points when they eliminate enemies.

Features:
As the score increases, the difficulty also increases
As the score increases, there will be more and more types of enemies.
The player's highest score will be saved
Switch the current weapon by touching the weapon bearer

operate:
Use the letter arrow keys to control the movement of the character, point the mouse in the shooting direction, and press the left mouse button to fire the bullet.

Key points:
There will be recoil when firing bullets, which will be a hindrance, but making good use of it can help you avoid enemy attacks.
Flexibly decide whether to switch weapons
Keep moving or you'll get attacked unexpectedly

This game borrows a lot from Bit Blaster, and due to my poor art skills, some of the special effects are imitated from Bit Blaster.
